task_description: Create the foundational project structure for SyncthingTemplar - a multi-instance Syncthing monitoring application. Establish .NET 9 Blazor Server project with MudBlazor UI library, navigation structure, and placeholder pages.

patterns.mudblazor_providers: MainLayout.razor MUST include all four providers: MudThemeProvider, MudPopoverProvider, MudDialogProvider, MudSnackbarProvider
patterns.simplicity_rule: Prefer explicit over implicit, avoid deep abstractions, single responsibility methods, self-documenting names
patterns.no_polling: Never use Timer, setInterval, or polling patterns - push-based architecture only

existing_implementations.description: Greenfield project - no existing code to reference
